name: 7 Gates to Hell (Games Development - IADE-UE)
description:
2D project developed by 1st year students of the Games Development course (2019/2020).

Developed by:

  • Daniel Martins
  • Vasco Soares

Controls:

  • Up or W - Jump
  • Right arrow or D - Move right
  • Left arrow or D - Move left
  • 1 or G - Slash
  • 2 or H - Charge
  • 3 or J - Heavy Slash
  • 4 or K - Adrenaline Rush
  • Esc - Pause

For more information about the university and the Games Development B.Sc., visit this link: https://www.iade.europeia.pt/en/courses/undergraduate/global-bachelor/games-deve...
